1368.HK.summary: Xtep International Holdings Limited engages in the design, development, manufacture, sale, and marketing and brand management of sports footwear, apparel, and accessories. The company sells its products primarily under the XTEP brand, as well as Palladium, K-Swiss, Saucony, and Merrell brand names. It is also involved in the trading of sportswear products. As of March 18, 2020, the company managed an extensive distribution network with exclusive distributors that operated approximately 6,300 stores covering 31 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities in the People's Republic of China. It also offers its products online. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China. Xtep International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Group Success Investments Limited.

1817.HK.summary: Mulsanne Group Holding Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the design, marketing, and sale of apparel products for men, women, and children in the People's Republic of China. It also provides sportswear. The company offers its products under the GXG, gxg jeans, gxg.kids, Yatlas, 2XU, and ESPRIT brands. It primarily sells its products to end customers through its self-owned stores, distributors, and partners, as well as through online retail platforms, such as Tmall.com, Taobao, and VIPshop. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 1,737 stores. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Ningbo, the People's Republic of China. Mulsanne Group Holding Limited is a subsidiary of Glory Cayman Holding Limited.

603157.SS.long_name: Xinjiang La Chapelle Fashion Co., Ltd.
603157.SS.summary: Xinjiang La Chapelle Fashion Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, designs, markets, and sells apparel products for ladies' casual wear in the People's Republic of China. Its products include tops, bottoms, dresses, and accessories. The company offers its apparel products under proprietary brands, such as La Chapelle, Puella, 7m, Candie's, La BabitÃ©, JACK WALK, Pote, MARC ECKO, 8em, La Chapelle+, and Naf Naf; and various invested brands, including, Siastella, tanni, Maria Luisa, NN, DrÃ¶mGalaxy, and Gartine. It is also involved in the sale of apparel products; E-commercial; and clothing tech and logistic storage services. The company sells its products directly to retail customers through physical retail points, as well as through online platforms. As of December 31, 2019, it had a retail network of 4,878 retail points, including 4,707 direct and 757 franchising retail outlets. The company was formerly known as Shanghai La Chapelle Fashion Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xinjiang La Chapelle Fashion Co., Ltd. in July 2020. Xinjiang La Chapelle Fashion Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shanghai, People's Republic of China.

603877.SS.summary: Ningbo Peacebird Fashion Co., Ltd. operates as a retail-oriented multi-brand fashion company in China. It develops and sells fashion products under the PEACEBIRD WOMEN, PEACEBIRD MEN, LEDIN, MATERIAL GIRL, Mini Peace, and PEACEBIRD LIVIN' brands through own stores and franchisees through a network of approximately 4,000 stores across 31 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.
